page.description: Get the field associated with the control.

item.name: Form Controls (for <OBJECT> use the <CONTROL> pointer or the address of the control)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.FIELD_GET() method returns a pointer to the table field that is bound to the control.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim frm as P dim fld as P dim tblfld as P frm = form.load("Customer Information") fld = frm.child("Lastname") tblfld = fld.Field_Get() ? tblfld.fullname_get() -> "CUSTOMER->LASTNAME"
